education_text.0: Mehrnoosh Sadrzadeh is an Iranian British academic who is a professor at      University College London University College LondonMehrnoosh Sadrzadeh is an Iranian British academic who is a professor at      University College London University College LondonIn 2011, Sadrzadeh was awarded an      Engineering and Physical Sciences Research Council Engineering and Physical Sciences Research Council Career Acceleration FellowshipWhilst      Machine learning machine learning can improve reasoning about textual data, systems making use of machine learning cannot be translated to all applications
